channel.title: Others on Live for Today
channel.description: Recent content in Others on Live for Today

item.title: Today
item.description: Today is mid-autumn festival in China. Today is also my wedding anniversary in US. Today is to remember! We usually don’t celebrate our birthdays. We like to celebrate Valentine’s Day instead. Recently, I read a book and it says that treat today is your last day so you won’t waste your time! I am to a degree if it is a positive day.

item.title: Party_Soccer_Team
item.description: This party was finally over and got relief now. Hosting a party for soccer team is stressful than others because they are Andyâ€™s friends. We made food plan together and started to prepare it couple of days earlier in order to make sure the party would be successful. Bought a box of frozen crab legs from Costco. We decided to serve them a seafood theme dinner. Appetizers: fried tofu & wonton
